title: I GIVE UP ON TRYING TO INSTAL THIS GAME.
body: ive been trying for weeks to install LoL, i have had it before and is a great game which is why i am fed up with getting error messages and failed updates EVERY TIME i try to install. it says "unspecified error occured. please check the logs for more information." like....really, im starting to get extremly mad because i want to play!

replies.body: i have resolved it, thanks for the offer though.
I'd like to help you get this resolved.  At what percent on the patcher are you receiving this error?  A screenshot could help too.  Let me know!
